name: d3-time
description: A calculator for humanityâ€™s peculiar conventions of time.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && json2module package.json > build/package.js && rollup -f umd -n d3_time -o build/d3-time.js -- index.js
scripts.test: TZ=America/Los_Angeles tape 'test/**/*-test.js' && test/test-time-zones && eslint index.js src
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-time.js -c -m -o build/d3-time.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && cp build/d3-time.js ../d3.github.com/d3-time.v0.2.js && cp build/d3-time.min.js ../d3.github.com/d3-time.v0.2.min.js && cd ../d3.github.com && git add d3-time.v0.2.js d3-time.v0.2.min.js && git commit -m "d3-time ${VERSION}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-time.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-time.js build/d3-time.min.js
